title: How many dangerous particles do European citizens breathe?
subtitle: The average PM2.5 pollution in the EU is as high as 10.32 µg/cubic meter and increased from 2023 to 2024 by 2.21%. This figure is still above the WHO recommendations of 5 µg/cubic meter.
textNote: The average value has been calculated based on the available annual mean data provided by a country specific varying number of air measuring stations.
